### Simon Says ###

<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px;">
<div style="flex: 2; width: 300px;">
<img src="images/simon_says.png" alt="Simon" style="width:100%; border-radius: 15px;">
</div>
  <div style="flex: 2; min-width: 300px;">
  <p class="justify-text"> 
    __Overview:__ <br>
    Designed an interactive memory game on a [Teensy 4.0](https://www.pjrc.com/teensy/card10a_rev2_web.pdf) microcontroller. 
    A sequence is played on the white LEDs and players repeat the correct pattern. Incorrect answers light the red LED and correct 
    answers light the green LED to increase the sequence length by 1. If the final sequence is played correctly, the yellow LED 
    will flash indicating a win.
  </p>

  <p> 
    __Skills:__ <br>
    Arduino
  </p>

    __Overview:__ <br>
    Designed and built a pickleball paddle for the 2025 Machine Shop Proctor Tournament. Modeled paddle dimensions 
    based on reference measurements and programmed toolpaths on the [ShopBot](https://shopbottools.com/) CNC Router, 
    including cutting strategies, feed rates, and tab placement for safe and precise milling. Painted and laser-cut 
    a stencil for precise lettering.

### Ballpoint Pen ###

<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px;">
<div style="flex: 2; width: 300px;">
<img src="images/wooden_pen.jpg" alt="ROV" style="width:100%; border-radius: 15px;">
</div>

<div style="flex: 2; min-width: 300px;">
  <p class="justify-text">
    __Overview:__ <br>
    Created a ballpoint pen through precision woodturning. Operated a lathe with gouges to achieve consistent cylindrical 
    symmetry, followed by progressive grit sanding for smoothness. Applied protective varnish finishing before press-fitting 
    the mechanical [hardware](https://www.thewoodturningstore.com/pen-making/pen-pencil-kits/) using an arbor press.
  </p>

  <p>
    __Skills:__ <br>
    Wood Lathe, Gouges, Wood Varnish, Arbor Press
  </p>
</div>
</div>

### Cheese Knife ###

<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px;">
<div style="flex: 2; width: 300px;">
<img src="images/cheese_knife.png" alt="ROV" style="width:100%; border-radius: 15px;">
</div>

<div style="flex: 2; min-width: 300px;">
  <p class="justify-text"> 
    __Overview:__ <br>
    Produced a set of custom wooden utensils, including a cheese knife, as family holiday gifts. Sketched utensil profiles based 
    on *[Wooden Utensils from the Bandsaw](https://www.rockler.com/wooden-utensils-from-the-bandsaw-paperback-book?)*. Rough-cut 
    stock material on the bandsaw, and shaped contours with sanders and hand-finishing. Applied mineral oil treatment for 
    food safety and durability.
  </p>

  <p>
    __Skills:__ <br>
    Bandsaw, Belt Sander, Spindle Sander
  </p>
